thread.title: Two men charged over Liverpool fan attack

title: Two men charged over Liverpool fan attack
text:
April 26, 2018 / 9:22 AM / Updated an hour ago Two men charged over Liverpool fan attack Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Two men have been charged in connection with an incident before Tuesdayâ€™s Champions League semi-final between Liverpool and Roma that left a man in a critical condition in hospital.
Filippo Lombardi, 20, was charged with violent disorder and wounding, and causing grievous bodily harm. Daniele Sciusco, 29, was charged with violent disorder.
Both men, who are believed to be Roma supporters, have been kept in custody to appear at South Sefton Magistrates Court later on Thursday.
The victim remains in hospital in a critical condition at Walton Neurological Centre. Reporting by Neil Robinson; Editing by Gareth Jones
